headline: Lulumon China CEO Discusses Consumption Outlook
summary: Lululemon is one of the few foreign brands seeing consistent growth in China. The company's China CEO San Yan Ng sees more opportunities ahead in China's second and third tier cities. She speaks with Stephen Engle on the sidelines of the China International Import Expo on "Bloomberg: The China Show".

content.title: Lulumon China CEO Discusses Consumption Outlook
